    • Class VirtualNodeGUI

      • Serialized Fields

        • backgroundColor
          Color backgroundColor
          The background color
        • buttonWidth
          int buttonWidth
          A subjectively good button width
        • flickerColor
          Color flickerColor
          The negative color of the background color to see the flicker whatever the color
        • flickerTextcolor
          Color flickerTextcolor
          Color of the text when flickering, if the negative color is dark
        • leftButton
          JButton leftButton
          The button to send a ping to the previous node
        • number
          int number
          This node's number

          JPanel numberPanel
          The panel containing the number of the node that is supposed to suit the size of the panel, but doens't work super well because of the circle
        • rightButton
          JButton rightButton
          The button to send a ping to the next node
        • thisController
          Controller thisController
          The caller of this class
